entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff that has been accused of being dangerous. He is described as being kept tethered and isolated in Hagrid's cabin.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is the one who filed an official complaint against Buckbeak, leading to his case being taken to the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a school governor and is concerned about Buckbeak's fate. He mentions that he knows the gargoyles at the Committee fer the Disposal o' Dangerous Creatures are not to be trusted.

entities.name: committee for the disposal of dangerous creatures
entities.description: The Committee is responsible for dealing with dangerous creatures like Buckbeak. Hagrid expresses his distrust towards them.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy filed an official complaint against Buckbeak, leading to his case being taken to the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures.

relationships.entity_2: committee for the disposal of dangerous creatures
relationships.description: Hagrid expresses his distrust towards the Committee fer the Disposal o' Dangerous Creatures.
